FYI. Demand reference:{0} has been closed by the Consumer. | Hint: Send "!close proposal:{1}", or, "!flag proposal:{1} note:enter-your-note-here" to improve your Twetailer Rating.
:-( Please verify the Proposal number you wish to Close and try again.
:-( You can't !close Proposal:{0} in the state:{1}.

FYI. Proposal:{0} has been closed by the Retailer. | Hint: Send "!close ref:{1}", or, "!flag ref:{1} note:enter-your-note-here" to improve your Twetailer Rating.
:-( You can only !close Proposals or Demands.
:-( You can only !confirm proposal:{0} for Demand reference:{1} when it's in state:{2}.
:-) Thank you for confirming Proposal:{0} for Demand ref:{1}, tags:{2} | Store:{3}, {4} will be asked to mark and hold Demand ref:{1}
:-) Proposal:{0} for tags:{1} has been confirmed.| Please mark, hold for Consumer with Demand reference:{2} and then !close proposal:{0}, or, !flag proposal:{0} note:your-note-here.
FYI: Demo Sales Associate will now !close your Demand

:-( Please verify the Proposal number you wish to Decline and try again.

The hash tag (#) concept is reserved for a future feature. For now, only the "#demo" tag is accepted.| Other values are ignored. You can add them to the proposal tag list with "!demand ref:{0} {1}"| Send "? demo" for help on the demo mode, and join the Twetailer community to get more details about future enhancements.
